mapper.select: select code, short_name, application_date, transaction_date, confirmation_date, settlement_date, fee, share, nav, amount, type, trading_platform, status from fund_transaction order by transaction_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fund_transaction (code, short_name, application_date, transaction_date, confirmation_date, settlement_date, fee, share, nav, amount, type, trading_platform, status) VALUES(#{code}, #{shortName}, #{applicationDate}, #{transactionDate}, #{confirmationDate}, #{settlementDate}, #{fee}, #{share}, #{nav}, #{amount}, #{type}, #{tradingPlatform}, #{status})
